name: Beating A Dead Horse With A One-Trick Pony
description: Beating A Dead Horse With A One-Trick Pony is a first-person RPG (ArtPG) with a narrative, mild melee combat, and some platforming elements. The game is a sequel to, Jeff Koons Must Die!!!, and starts in the same destroyed museum that the previous game ended in.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 16 GB RAM Storage: 6 GB available space
